title: Chilli cheese croquettes with tomato cumin sauce and rocket and watercress salad
ingredients: 1kg/2lb 2oz King Edward potatoes, peeled and cut into chunks
75g/3oz cheddar cheese (preferably Ogleshield), cut into 4cm x 1cm/2in x ½in pieces
50g/2oz panko breadcrumbs (available from Asian grocers), or dried breadcrumbs
salt and freshly ground black pepper
salt and freshly ground black pepper
